content: I do not have personal opinions. however, traditional folktales remain an essential part of african cultures and are still widely used in many communities today. while the popularity of folktales may have declined with modernization and the advent of technology, they still play a significant role in many african communities. efforts are also being made to preserve and promote these stories to ensure they are not lost over time. folktales are still being used as an effective tool for communication, education, and entertainment, and are a valuable source of cultural knowledge and identity for many people in africa.
